## Editor.JsonEditorState class

Represents the internal state of a [JsonEditor](./ts-json.editor.jsoneditor.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class JsonEditorState 
```

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [context](./ts-json.editor.jsoneditorstate.context.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [IJsonContext](./ts-json.ijsoncontext.md) \| undefined | The optional [JSON context](./ts-json.ijsoncontext.md) for this state. |
|  [deferred](./ts-json.editor.jsoneditorstate.deferred.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [JsonObject](./ts-json.jsonobject.md)<!-- -->\[\] | An array of [objects](./ts-json.jsonobject.md) that are deferred for merge during finalization. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [defer(obj)](./ts-json.editor.jsoneditorstate.defer.md) |  | Adds a supplied [object](./ts-json.jsonobject.md) to the deferred list. |
|  [extendContext(baseContext, add)](./ts-json.editor.jsoneditorstate.extendcontext.md) |  | Constructs a new [IJsonContext](./ts-json.ijsoncontext.md) by merging supplied variables and references into a supplied existing context. |
|  [failValidation(rule, message, validation)](./ts-json.editor.jsoneditorstate.failvalidation.md) |  | Helper method to constructs <code>DetailedFailure</code> with appropriate details and messaging for various validation failures. |
|  [getContext(defaultContext)](./ts-json.editor.jsoneditorstate.getcontext.md) |  | Gets the context of this [JsonEditorState](./ts-json.editor.jsoneditorstate.md) or an optionally supplied default context if this state has no context. |
|  [getRefs(defaultContext)](./ts-json.editor.jsoneditorstate.getrefs.md) |  | Gets an [reference map](./ts-json.ijsonreferencemap.md) containing any other values referenced during the operation. |
|  [getVars(defaultContext)](./ts-json.editor.jsoneditorstate.getvars.md) |  | Gets a [TemplateVars](./ts-json.templatevars.md) from the context of this [JsonEditorState](./ts-json.editor.jsoneditorstate.md)<!-- -->, or from an optional supplied [IJsonContext](./ts-json.ijsoncontext.md) if the current state has no default context. |
